modName: ENB-FXAA hybrid for Realistic Lighting and URWL
summary: ENBSeries and FXAA Post Process Injector config for Realistic Lighting and URWL Mod.
descriptionHtml:
This is my ENB config with FXAA color correction for Realistic Lighting and URWL.

INSTALLATION:

Download and install ENBSeries v0.112 Kage
http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm

Download and install Realistic Lighting with Customization 3.31
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7654

Download and install ULTRA REALISTIC WORLD LIGHTING for Skyrim 1E (if you have older version 1B, it suits even better)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13531

Download and install Revamped Exterior Fog
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9930

Extract files in your main Skyrim directory > overwrite.

Load order:
Realistic Lighting.esp
Realistic Lighting patcher.esp
SkyrimURWL.esp
RevampedExteriorFog.esp


Set bFloatPointRenderTarget=1 in SkyrimPrefs.ini (in Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim)
Set fGamma=1.0000

=========================================================================================
Update to 1.4
Tweaked settings to fit Ultra Realistic lighting. 

=========================================================================================
Update to 1.3
Tweaked colors, lighting, sharpening, saturation, brightness and DOF settings.
Added Fast DOF effect. Removed Chroma effect.

=========================================================================================
Update to 1.2
Balanced brightness, colors and lighting.
Added Chroma effect.

=========================================================================================
Update to 1.1

Better night sky
SMOOTH DOF and CHROMA DOF effect, thanks to Matso.
Reduced direct lighting.
Tweaked many settings.

=========================================================================================
Update to 1.01

Disabled pre-sharpen effect.

=========================================================================================

Recommend mods:

Lush grass
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3288

Glorious Grasses
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9185

enhanced lighting for realistic lighting. (if you wan\'t brighter interior)
Steam Workshop

=========================================================================================

Credits:
Boris Vorontsov (ENB)

Timothy Lottes (FXAA)
Some dude
BeetleatWar1977
[DKT70]
Violator
fpedace

Pluto - 747823 (Realistic lighting)
Leviathan1753

Matso (Depth of Field effect)

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
author: Obliver
